Using the Control/Tab keyboard shortcut, occasionally Firefox will zoom in significantly. It's at random and very strange, but very annoying as i have to command/0 to reset the sizes back to normal. 

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open firefox with multiple tabs
2.press control tab at the same time to attempt to switch tabs
3.repeat step 2 until desired (undesired) result/glitch
Actual Results:  
strangely, it was happening almost ever twenty or so tab switches, but now i can't recreate it with the current open pages. i wonder if it has anything to do with what windows are open and what code/etc they have..


feel free to email/call. i'm glad to help as this is a significant bug and extremely annoying.
comments.author: mostlynumber6@hotmail.com
